department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 28 at 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide confectionary food items as required to Edmonton Institution for Women to Correctional Service Canada.
full_summary:
**Notice Title:** Request for Standing Offer for Confectionary / Food Items [WS4138609713]
================================================================================

**Introduction:**
On November 10, 2023, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a request for standing offer (RFSO) for confectionary/food items on behalf of the Correctional Service Canada (CSC). The tender closes on November 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

**Notice Details:**
* Solicitation Number: WS4138609713
* Reference Number: WS4138609713-Doc4300761580
* Publication Date: November 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Tender Description:**
Canada is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide confectionary and food items to the Edmonton Institution for Women, Correctional Service of Canada. The tender is for a standing offer, with Expected Contract Start Date: December 15, 2023, and Expected Contract End Date: September 28, 2026.

**Tender Method:**
This tender will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price method.

**Bid Submission:**
All bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. Supporting documentation must be submitted along with the bid. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time, and CanadaBuys posting closing time. The new deadline for bid submission is November 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact:

* Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: [Available upon request]
* Fax: [Not available]
* Address: [Available upon request]

**Notice URL:**
The tender notice is available on the Ariba Discovery portal: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17980010?extsite=MTc5ODAwMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17980010?extsite=MTc5ODAwMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/
